sentence.Network_en: This small gift is only a tiny token of our gratefulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这件小小的礼物略表我们的感激之情.

sentence.Network_en: This card is only a small token of our gratefulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这张卡片略表我们的感激之情.

sentence.Network_en: Send you our evercontinueing feeling gratefulness and thankfulness on the special day.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这特别的西方全国日常表达谨向您致以咱们永恒的感激之情.
